Detailed Description

This class represents a disturbance and the area it covers.

It contains the disturbances ID, situationReference, and boundingbox.

Definition at line 110 of file RemoveDisturbancePacket.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

const MC2String &  situationReference,
const MC2BoundingBox &  bbox
) 
 

Constructor with values.

Parameters:
disturbanceID The ID of this disturbance.
situationReference The situationReference string of this disturbance.
bbox The smallest boundingbox that contains all coordinates of this disturbance.

DisturbanceBBox::DisturbanceBBox (   ) 
 

Default constructor.

The disturbanceID is set to MAX_UINT32, the situationReference to the empty string and the boundingbox to (0,0,0,0);
